reviews.text: We went here on a Tuesday, staff were very accommodating and friendly as neither of us spoke much French. Staff were very attentive and service was great. Nice cosy atmosphere and food was amazing. Would recommend.
The staff was friendly, the atmosphere was great, and the tapas were tasty. The cocktails were also enjoyable. It's a worthwhile spot, with an average cost of 30-40 euros per person.

Excellent tapas! Busy, fun vibe! Seated on bar stools at a table is not my favourite and I was surprised that there was smoking in the restaurant- but that’s probably a bonus for many Marseille habitants.

The food was GREAT! We got a mix of everything but the best was the octopus salad and gnocchis. Paired with the ambience, it was an experience in the middle of nowhere. Our server was a little forgetful and made me feel like everything I asked for was ignored (unless my husband asked for it) which was weird. But the food outweighed the service.

Great tapas and even greater staff. We come from Canada, but are not French speaking which did not stop the waiters and manager(?) from coming over and making conversation with us. The drinks (mojito and wine) were great. Tapas better. Especially enjoyed the special of the day with chorizo feature. We were given a digestif drink on the house before we left and well wishes by many of the staff on our way out! Highly enjoyed. Fair prices also, 58€ for two with 6 tapas, 2 deserts and 2 drinks.
